# R

```{r}
library(rgbif)
library(terra)
library(geodata)
library(sf)
d <- occ_data(scientificName = 'Polygonaceae', hasCoordinate = T, country = 'DO')
rd <- gadm(country="DO", level=0, path=tempdir())
rd_sf <- st_as_sf(rd)
table(d$data$species)
length(unique(d$data$species))
```
